name: programPlanning
author: Siemens Product Lifecycle Management Software Inc.

Pgp0ShiftEventCommandContext.expression: ((( ctx.xrtPageContext.primaryXrtPageID === 'tc_xrt_Timeline' || ctx.xrtPageContext.secondaryXrtPageID === 'tc_xrt_Timeline' ||  ctx.xrtPageContext.primaryXrtPageID === 'tc_xrt_Events' || ctx.xrtPageContext.secondaryXrtPageID === 'tc_xrt_Events') && ctx.selected.modelType.typeHierarchyArray.indexOf('Prg0AbsEvent') > -1 && ctx.mselected.length === 1) || ( (ctx.xrtPageContext.secondaryXrtPageID === 'tc_xrt_Overview' || ctx.xrtPageContext.primaryXrtPageID === 'tc_xrt_Overview') && ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject.modelType.typeHierarchyArray.indexOf('Prg0AbsEvent') > -1) )

addProjectOnTimelineCmdVisibility.expression: conditions.isPlanNavigationSublocation && (ctx.mselected.length === 1 && ctx.selected.modelType.typeHierarchyArray.indexOf('Prg0AbsPlan') > -1) && ctx.selected.props.prg0AllowsChildren.dbValues[0] === '1' && ctx.isColumnFilteringApplied !== true && ( ctx.selected.levelNdx >= 0 || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo === undefined || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount === 0 )

quickAddPlanOnTimelineCmdEnable.expression: conditions.isPlanNavigationSublocation && ctx.timelineContext.selected.modelType.typeHierarchyArray.indexOf('Prg0AbsPlan') > -1 && ctx.timelineContext.selected.props.prg0AllowsChildren.dbValues[0] === '1' && ctx.mselected.length === 1 && ctx.isColumnFilteringApplied !== true && ( ctx.selected.levelNdx >= 0 || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo === undefined || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount === 0 )

addEventOnTimelineCmdVisibility.expression: conditions.isPlanNavigationSublocation && (ctx.mselected.length === 1 && ctx.selected.modelType.typeHierarchyArray.indexOf('Prg0AbsPlan') > -1 )  && (ctx.showTimeline === true) && ctx.isColumnFilteringApplied !== true && ( ctx.selected.levelNdx >= 0 || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo === undefined || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount === 0 )

quickAddEventOnTimelineCmdEnable.expression: conditions.isPlanNavigationSublocation && ctx.timelineContext.selected.modelType.typeHierarchyArray.indexOf('Prg0AbsPlan') > -1 && ctx.timelineContext.eventQuickCreateObjects.indexOf(ctx.timelineContext.selected.type) > -1  && (ctx.showTimeline === true) && ctx.mselected.length === 1 && ctx.isColumnFilteringApplied !== true && ( ctx.selected.levelNdx >= 0 || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo === undefined || ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount === 0 )

Pgp0MoveUpCommandVisibility.expression: conditions.Pgp0MoveCommandVisibility && ctx.selected.childNdx && conditions.Pgp0MoveSelectedObject && ctx.selected.childNdx > 0 && ctx.isColumnFilteringApplied !== true
